title: Hostage
description: In this Dateline classic, survivors of the 2013 Westgate Mall attack in Nairobi, Kenya, share their stories with Kate Snow. Originally aired on NBC on November 22, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
